name: mimeograph
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also mimeograph machine) a machine that produces copies of a document using a stencil (= a piece of plastic or metal into which shapes have been cut, through which ink is forced): If we needed to copy a document, we usually used a mimeograph or carbon paper. What happened to the mimeograph machine on which your teacher cranked out those daunting tests?
a copy of a document produced on a mimeograph machine: The first page is smeared with black ink like an old mimeograph. She kept mimeographs of every letter posted by her grandmother.

to produce a document on a mimeograph machine: Hunter put all of it into the form of a petition, mimeographed it, then hit the streets. The couple put together some mimeographed postcards touting their new business and crossed their fingers.
